scripts.build:remotes: concurrently "npm run build -w apple" "npm run build -w banana" "npm run build -w camel"
scripts.preview:remotes: concurrently "npm run preview -w apple" "npm run preview -w banana" "npm run preview -w camel"
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:remotes && concurrently "npm run preview:remotes" "npm run dev:root"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w apple && npm install -w banana && npm install -w camel && npm install -w root
